languages.text: "Поразительно, что этот идиот только не досдал десятину, а не потерял невзначай всю планету". {n}Соломон умолкает, задумчиво глядя вслед губернатору.{/n} "Ладно, пир так пир. Меня уже тошнит от смрада паленого мяса, пора сменить обстановку".

traits.locale_text: "Скудомие правящей элиты — типичная причина отстуствия порядка и дисциплины. И субординации". {n}Арбитес бросает острый взгляд на Лидзи. Ее глаза сверкают негодованием, но она тотчас отводит глаза.{/n}

languages.text: "It amazes me that that idiot just underpaid the tithe and did not somehow lose the whole planet as well." {n}Solomorne pauses, pensively watching the governor leave.{/n} "Fine, a feast it is. I am sick of the stench of burnt meat — let's try a change of scenery."
languages.original_text: "Поразительно, что этот идиот только не досдал десятину, а не потерял невзначай всю планету". {n}Соломон умолкает, задумчиво глядя вслед губернатору.{/n} "Ладно, пир так пир. Меня уже тошнит от смрада паленого мяса, пора сменить обстановку".

traits.locale_text: "It amazes me that that idiot just underpaid the tithe and did not somehow lose the whole planet as well." {n}Solomorne pauses, pensively watching the governor leave.{/n} "Fine, a feast it is. I am sick of the stench of burnt meat — let's try a change of scenery."

"It amazes me that that idiot just underpaid the tithe and did not somehow lose the whole planet as well." {n}Solomorne pauses, pensively watching the governor leave.{/n} "Fine, a feast it is. I am sick of the stench of burnt meat — let's try a change of scenery."

"Paucity of intellect among the ruling elite is often to blame for the absence of order and discipline. And for insubordination." {n}Solomorne casts a sharp glance at Lidzy. Her eyes spark with indignation, but she immediately averts her gaze and smiles at you.{/n}

"It amazes me that that idiot just underpaid the tithe and did not somehow lose the whole planet as well." {n}Solomorne pauses, pensively watching the governor leave.{/n} "Fine, a feast it is. I am sick of the stench of burnt meat — let's try a change of scenery."

"It amazes me that that idiot just underpaid the tithe and did not somehow lose the whole planet as well." {n}Solomorne pauses, pensively watching the governor leave.{/n} "Fine, a feast it is. I am sick of the stench of burnt meat — let's try a change of scenery."

"It amazes me that that idiot just underpaid the tithe and did not somehow lose the whole planet as well." {n}Solomorne pauses, pensively watching the governor leave.{/n} "Fine, a feast it is. I am sick of the stench of burnt meat — let's try a change of scenery."

"It amazes me that that idiot just underpaid the tithe and did not somehow lose the whole planet as well." {n}Solomorne pauses, pensively watching the governor leave.{/n} "Fine, a feast it is. I am sick of the stench of burnt meat — let's try a change of scenery."

languages.text: “这个白痴仅仅是欠了一部分什一税没交，这颗行星居然还在他的掌控下，这真是让我相当惊讶。”{n}索罗蒙顿了顿，若有所思地看着总督离开的身影。{/n}“好吧，那就参加宴会吧。人肉烧焦的味道已经让我反胃了，我们还是换换心情吧。”
languages.original_text: "It amazes me that that idiot just underpaid the tithe and did not somehow lose the whole planet as well." {n}Solomorne pauses, pensively watching the governor leave.{/n} "Fine, a feast it is. I am sick of the stench of burnt meat — let's try a change of scenery."

traits.locale_text: “这个白痴仅仅是欠了一部分什一税没交，这颗行星居然还在他的掌控下，这真是让我相当惊讶。”{n}索罗蒙顿了顿，若有所思地看着总督离开的身影。{/n}“好吧，那就参加宴会吧。人肉烧焦的味道已经让我反胃了，我们还是换换心情吧。”

languages.text: «Me sorprende que ese idiota haya escatimado en el diezmo y sin embargo haya logrado no perder también el planeta». {n}Solomorne hace una pausa para observar con aire pensativo al gobernador mientras se marcha.{/n} «En fin, vayamos al banquete. Estoy harto del hedor a carne quemada; nos vendrá bien un cambio de aires».
languages.original_text: "It amazes me that that idiot just underpaid the tithe and did not somehow lose the whole planet as well." {n}Solomorne pauses, pensively watching the governor leave.{/n} "Fine, a feast it is. I am sick of the stench of burnt meat — let's try a change of scenery."

traits.locale_text: «Me sorprende que ese idiota haya escatimado en el diezmo y sin embargo haya logrado no perder también el planeta». {n}Solomorne hace una pausa para observar con aire pensativo al gobernador mientras se marcha.{/n} «En fin, vayamos al banquete. Estoy harto del hedor a carne quemada; nos vendrá bien un cambio de aires».

languages.text: "Bu aptalın sadece aşarı eksik ödeyip bir şekilde koca gezegeni de kaybetmemesi beni şaşırtıyor." {n}Solomorne duraklıyor, valinin gidişini düşünceli bir şekilde izliyor.{/n} "Ziyafet ziyafettir. Yanık et kokusundan bıktım. Manzara değişikliği yapalım."
languages.original_text: "It amazes me that that idiot just underpaid the tithe and did not somehow lose the whole planet as well." {n}Solomorne pauses, pensively watching the governor leave.{/n} "Fine, a feast it is. I am sick of the stench of burnt meat — let's try a change of scenery."

traits.locale_text: "Bu aptalın sadece aşarı eksik ödeyip bir şekilde koca gezegeni de kaybetmemesi beni şaşırtıyor." {n}Solomorne duraklıyor, valinin gidişini düşünceli bir şekilde izliyor.{/n} "Ziyafet ziyafettir. Yanık et kokusundan bıktım. Manzara değişikliği yapalım."

languages.text: 「あの馬鹿者が租税を未払いにして、どうにかしてその惑星を失わなかったのが驚きだ」{n}ソロモーンはそこで言葉を止め、物思いに沈んで総督が去るのを見る。{/n}「まあ、宴会にしよう。燃えた肉の悪臭にはうんざりだ。気分転換しょう」
languages.original_text: "It amazes me that that idiot just underpaid the tithe and did not somehow lose the whole planet as well." {n}Solomorne pauses, pensively watching the governor leave.{/n} "Fine, a feast it is. I am sick of the stench of burnt meat — let's try a change of scenery."

traits.locale_text: 「あの馬鹿者が租税を未払いにして、どうにかしてその惑星を失わなかったのが驚きだ」{n}ソロモーンはそこで言葉を止め、物思いに沈んで総督が去るのを見る。{/n}「まあ、宴会にしよう。燃えた肉の悪臭にはうんざりだ。気分転換しょう」

languages.text: « Je n'en reviens pas que cet idiot ait seulement manqué à ses obligations fiscales et qu'il n'ait pas aussi perdu la planète tout entière, par-dessus le marché. {n}Solomorne s'interrompt et regarde le gouverneur s'éloigner d'un air songeur.{/n} Bon, va pour une petite sauterie. La puanteur de la chair carbonisée me donne la nausée... Un changement de décor sera le bienvenu. »
languages.original_text: "It amazes me that that idiot just underpaid the tithe and did not somehow lose the whole planet as well." {n}Solomorne pauses, pensively watching the governor leave.{/n} "Fine, a feast it is. I am sick of the stench of burnt meat — let's try a change of scenery."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'en reviens pas que cet idiot ait seulement manqué à ses obligations fiscales et qu'il n'ait pas aussi perdu la planète tout entière, par-dessus le marché. {n}Solomorne s'interrompt et regarde le gouverneur s'éloigner d'un air songeur.{/n} Bon, va pour une petite sauterie. La puanteur de la chair carbonisée me donne la nausée... Un changement de décor sera le bienvenu. »

languages.text: "Erstaunlich, dass dieser Idiot nur zu wenig Zehnt bezahlt hat und nicht den ganzen Planeten verloren hat." {n}Solomorne hält inne und blickt dem Gouverneur nachdenklich hinterher.{/n}"Also schön, ein Festmahl also. Ich habe den Gestank von verbranntem Fleisch satt ... ein Tapetenwechsel schadet also nicht."
languages.original_text: "It amazes me that that idiot just underpaid the tithe and did not somehow lose the whole planet as well." {n}Solomorne pauses, pensively watching the governor leave.{/n} "Fine, a feast it is. I am sick of the stench of burnt meat — let's try a change of scenery."

traits.locale_text: "Erstaunlich, dass dieser Idiot nur zu wenig Zehnt bezahlt hat und nicht den ganzen Planeten verloren hat." {n}Solomorne hält inne und blickt dem Gouverneur nachdenklich hinterher.{/n}"Also schön, ein Festmahl also. Ich habe den Gestank von verbranntem Fleisch satt ... ein Tapetenwechsel schadet also nicht."
